name: Bubble Escape
description:
Keyboard:
Left and Right Arrow to move 
Z: Dash Left
X: Dash Right

Controller:
Left and Right on d-pad or stick to Move
Left Trigger: Dash Left
Right Trigger: Dash Right

This game was created in 12 hours solo. The jam had an added challenge that every hour during the jam you could add "scope creep" which would add another noun or adjective to your theme.

Jam Main theme: Plump Bubble

Added Scope Elements: Fashion, Enlarged, Ocean, Spoon, Cloud, Day, Senses, Vampire
